summary: NodeCollator orchestrates the creation of minibatch inputs for graph neural network models by gathering target nodes, sampling their multi‑layer neighborhoods, and assembling the resulting computation graphs (blocks) that capture message‑passing dependencies.
business_intent: Facilitate scalable training of node‑level GNN tasks (classification or regression) on a single large graph by providing a ready‑to‑use collate mechanism compatible with PyTorch DataLoader, handling neighbor sampling and data preparation automatically.
